item.title: yellow
item.description:
$(function () { var html = "

<iframe frameborder="no" border="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" width=100% height=86 src="//music.163.com/outchain/player?type=2&id=5162474&auto=1&height=66"></iframe>

" html = html.replace(/"{/g, "{") html = html.replace(/{"/g, "{") html = html.replace(/"}/g, "}") html = html.replace(/}"/g, "}") $('#raw').html(html); let postTitle = $('.posttitle').text() let postContentTitle = $('#raw h1').text() if(postTitle === postContentTitle){ $('#raw h1').hide() } $('button.preview').hide() }) :-) Look at the stars 抬头仰望满天繁星 Look how they shine for you 看它们

item.title: do not go gentle into that good night
item.description:
$(function () { var html = "

<iframe frameborder="no" border="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" width=100% height=86 src="//music.163.com/outchain/player?type=2&id=1470877170&auto=1&height=66"></iframe>

" html = html.replace(/"{/g, "{") html = html.replace(/{"/g, "{") html = html.replace(/"}/g, "}") html = html.replace(/}"/g, "}") $('#raw').html(html); let postTitle = $('.posttitle').text() let postContentTitle = $('#raw h1').text() if(postTitle === postContentTitle){ $('#raw h1').hide() } $('button.preview').hide() }) (Dylan Thomas, 1914 - 1953) Do not go gentle into that good night, 不要温和地走进那个
